name: GetIterationPerformance
description: Get detailed performance information about an iteration.

projectId.description: The id of the project the iteration belongs to.

iterationId.description: The id of the iteration to get.

threshold.description: The threshold used to determine true predictions.

overlapThreshold.description: If applicable, the bounding box overlap threshold used to determine true predictions.

$block: Represents the detailed performance data for a trained iteration.

$ul: **averagePrecision**: Gets the average precision when applicable.
**perTagPerformance**: Gets the per-tag performance details for this iteration.
**precisionStdDeviation**: Gets the standard deviation for the precision.
**recallStdDeviation**: Gets the standard deviation for the recall.
**message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
